data.message: Wow! what an inspiration... How can we start something like that here?

replies.message: Hi there, Cindi. We're happy to hear you were inspired by the video. #GivingTuesday is a global day dedicated to giving back. It is a day that charities, families, businesses, community centers, and students around the world come together for one common purpose: to celebrate generosity and to give. For more information, visit http://on.fb.me/1N3Pn5f. Thanks. -Kate
Cindi, we are looking for people who are interested in starting a similar page locally and you can email ty@facinghomelessness.org for more information.  Thank you!
No me gusta nada los políticos estos que parase unos perroflautas osea que se vayan todos a trabajar que lo que tienen que hacer y menos rollos
